original: intros a b c H1 H2. rewrite frac_eq with (d:=1). - rewrite Z_div_plus_full. + rewrite Z.quot_mul_cancel_l. * rewrite Z.quot_div_exact. ++ rewrite Z.quot_mul_cancel_l. rewrite Rcross_prod with (c:=1)(d:=1). +++ replace (b * (1 * 1)) with (b * 1) by ring. simpl. rewrite Rmult_1_r. reflexivity. +++ apply H1. +++ apply H2. +++ reflexivity. +++ apply H1. ++ apply H1. * apply H2. + apply H2. - apply H1. - apply H2.
